title: WTB Turkey Red Cobb, several others
author: drumback

posts.post_title: WTB Turkey Red Cobb, several others
posts.post_content: I am looking to upgrade my Turkey Red Cobb, Mathewson, Johnson, Jennings, Camnitz, Murray, H. McIntyre, Wilson, Waddell, Lajoie and  Carrigan.  Eye appeal matters, grade does not.  Raw is fine.
